p: Based on NIST library database results, area percentage of GC- chromatogram and MS spectral results,two major constituent compounds from each EO were identified and selected (Table 2). For EO of As, the major compounds identified were Diallyldisulfide and Diallyltrisulfide, for the EO of Mp, the compounds were Carvone and Limonene and for the EO of Em, the compounds were Eudesmol and Eucalyptol. For the EO of Os the major compounds identified were Eugenol and MethylEugenol and for the EO of Cl the compounds identified were Eucalyptol and α- pinene (Fig. 1, Supplementary Figs 5– 8, Supplementary Tables 1– 5).
